body.p:
To his Excellency
B. Magoffin Gov of Ky

The Undersigned Citizens of Spencer County would respectfully ask your Executive Clemency in behalf of Vincent Shields now Confined in the penitentiary of this State under sentence of the Union Circuit Court.

Your Petitioners have for a long time been acquainted with the Said Vincent he having been a Citizen of the County from his birth up to a few years since. He is also a very old and infirm man the father of a large family of small children who require the care and attention of some one. We have also heard of the Circumstances with which he was summonded upon his trial as well as a true representation of all the facts in relation to the said charge and all the premises considered as induced to believe that he is an object for Executive Clemency We therefore request that you grant him a pardon February 17" 1862
